affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
notes:
The initial bubble effect is only visible to allies.
Units tossed in the air will be stunned and still able to be attacked.
attrib:
RADIUS: 225
MOVE SLOW: 35%
SLOW DURATION: 1/2/3/4
STUN DURATION: 1.53/1.53/1.53/1.53
DELAY: 1.6/1.6/1.6/1.6
cmb:
120/120/120/120
10
lore: An ancestral rush of water explodes from the center of the world, called upon by the Admiral.
name: kunkka_torrent

desc: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
notes:
Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.
Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.
Cooldown isn't activated on denies, so the damage bonus is maintained.
cmb: 13/10/7/4
lore: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.
name: kunkka_tidebringer

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Heroes
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds.  Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.
notes:
If the target becomes Spell Immune after the cast, the target will not return to the X after the duration.
Interrupts channeling spells.
cmb:
50
19/16/13/10
lore: The Admiral's set of arcane abilities includes some that can be used for battle as well as entertainment.
name: kunkka_x_marks_the_spot

affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to 50% of all incoming damage.
notes:
Damage dealt after Rum wears off is non-lethal and can never kill a hero.
Actual area of effect of ship's collision is larger than the boat itself.
The boat has a movement speed of 650.
attrib:
IMPACT DELAY: 3
RANGE: 1000/1000/1000
WIDTH: 425/425/425
RUM BONUS SPEED: 10%/10%/10%
RUM DURATION: 10
STUN DURATION: 1.4/1.4/1.4
cmb:
150/200/250
60/50/40
lore: The final ship of the Claddish Navy is nothing but a phantom, but it is all too real to the enemies of the Admiral.
name: kunkka_ghostship

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Returns the marked hero to the X.
cmb: 1
name: kunkka_return
